thread.title: Watch The Weeknd and Daft Punk's Odd, Futuristic Grammys Performance
thread.title_full: Watch The Weeknd and Daft Punk's Odd, Futuristic Grammys Performance

author: Alex Robert Ross
title: Watch The Weeknd and Daft Punk's Odd, Futuristic Grammys Performance
text:
Watch The Weeknd and Daft Punk's Odd, Futuristic Grammys Performance Abel and his "robot friends" played "I Feel It Coming." 
French robot-men Daft Punk dressed up like motorcycle-loving Darth Vaders and joined The Weeknd onstage at the Grammys tonight for a flawless performance of "I Feel It Coming." In fact, after a brief but charming introduction from Paris Jackson (who shouted out the #NODAPL protests), the whole set felt like an homage to George Lucas, a delightfully kitschy 1980s sci-fi film held together by lasers. Most importantly, Abel Tesfaye sung the track perfectly and brought just enough stage presence to distract from the fact that his backing band consisted of two static automatons. Check out the full performance below. 
Follow Noisey on Twitter .
